content.title: Who are we
content.body: A SeriouslyCasual player is one that knows the ins and outs of their class, can consistently perform up to a mythic raiding standard, and enjoys a relaxed social environment. If that sounds like you, then we‚Äôd love to hear from you!

content.title: What We Want From You
content.body:
- Know everything there is to know about your class at any given time. This includes rotations, use of defensives, consumables, legendaries, specs, enchants, and the like.
- Be proactive and prepared for every raid encounter. This means researching boss fights.
- Be mature and friendly. Bonus points if you‚Äôre funny.
- Attend at least 90% of our scheduled raids within any given tier.
- Be ready to receive criticism (where its warranted, of course).

content.title: What We Can Give You
content.body:
- A stable mythic raiding guild with over 9 years of raiding at World of Warcraft‚Äôs highest levels.

If you're an exceptional player and your class isn't listed, we still encourage you to apply. Exceptional players will always be considered regardless of class or spec.
